actions.name: Hive Defense

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Physical- or Special-Category attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Physical- or Special-Category attack.

Effect: The user freely moves up to half of the Movement Score of their choice, and freely uses Infestation, including the triggering creature in its Blast area.

system.description:
